Package mypackage

Class Employee

java.lang.Object
mypackage.User
mypackage.Employee
Direct Known Subclasses:
HourlyEmployee
public class Employee extends User
This class is used to determine employees; an employee is a user of our system

    • HandlePromotion

      public void HandlePromotion(String targetid) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException
      If an employee has a promotion pending then this method bumps up their position and changes their scale back to 1 if they accept the promotion If the employee rejects the promotion it changes their promotion id back to 0;
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException
      IOException
